net.zeroisnan.oscscorep5

Class ScorePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zeroisnan.oscscorep5.ScorePlayer

  • public class ScorePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Replay the content of a XML score generated with ScoreRecorder.

    The recommended usage model is through the play() function of the OscScoreP5 class. If a finer level control is required, a ScorePlayer object can be created directly and shall be connected to an OscP5 object implementing the OscLoopback interface, like OscScoreP5.

    Low level usage example: 

     // instantiate an OscP5 object implementing he OscLoopback interface,
 // like OscScoreP5 as ScorePlayer needs a loopback() method to replay
 // the messages
 OscScoreP5 sca = new OscScoreP5(this, localport);

 // create an ScorePlayer instance to replay the content of a XML score
 ScorePlayer oscplay = new ScorePlayer(this, "mydump.xml", sca);
